title: Trump favors fossil fuels, donor base, bad news abound | Letters
description: Letters include how President Trump continues to favor fossil fuel industry and donor base, and waking up to more bad news from Trump administration.

title: ‘What do you refuse to accept happened 20 years ago?’ – 23 events from two decades ago that will make you feel ancient
description: The word ‘chronotachysis’ describes the idea that time moves faster as we age, as anyone over the age of 40 will tell you. As you get older, time flies whether you’re having fun or not. They’ve been chatting about this slightly distressing phenomenon on the AskUK subreddit after OpenCantaloupe4790 posted this: What do you refuse [...]The post ‘What do you refuse to accept happened 20 years ago?’ – 23 events from two decades ago that will make you feel ancient appeared first on The Poke.

title: Large organic molecules discovered on Mars likely came from ancient life
description: In March 2024, NASA’s Curiosity Rover discovered the largest organic molecules known on Mars. New analysis suggests that it is likely of biological origin.

title: Chief Rabbi: Value of ancient half-shekel is 80 NIS
description: Sephardic Chief Rabbi David Yosef says price of silver has risen, worth of ancient half-shekel coin stands at 80 NIS.

title: The fossil fuel tycoon teaming up with the Rockefellers to fight energy poverty
description: EQT Chief Executive Toby Rice is starting a nonprofit to tackle a lack of access to modern energy infrastructure in poor nations.
